@description.name: @description
@description.body: Methods to work with the delegate pattern.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the delegate method given my its name.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: delegate {Object} The delegate object to check the method.
@param.description: The delegate object to check the method.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: specificMethod {String} The name of the delegate method.
@param.description: The name of the delegate method.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Function|null} The requested method or null, if no method is set.
@return.description: The requested method or null, if no method is set.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks, if the given delegate is valid or if a specific method is given.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: specificMethod {String} The name of the method to search for.
@param.description: The name of the method to search for.
